Commentary: Ehsan Adil to Smith, no run, back of a length on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
Ehsan Adil to Smith, FOUR, short and wide, and he stands up tall and cracks it away crisply through point. Just rolls his wrists over at the top of the bounce and watches it run away to the boundary
Ehsan Adil to Smith, 1 run, full, a bit of swing in towards off stump, pushed down the ground towards mid-on
Ehsan Adil to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, shortish on leg stump. Looks to pull it away but is in too closed a position and it hits his thigh pad and runs away towards short fine leg
Ehsan Adil to Smith, no run, yorker on middle stump, jams his bat down to dig it out into the off side

Ehsan Adil to Smith, 2 runs, full on middle stump, clips it towards mid-on and sets off for a single. The throw is just wide of the stumps at the bowler's end - not sure Smith would have made it if it was a direct hit - and he ends up getting an overthrow as well
Zia-ul-Haq to Sharjeel Khan, 1 leg bye, quickish length ball angling down leg. Can't connect with the flick and it rolls off the pad into the leg side
Zia-ul-Haq to Smith, FOUR, short, wide, punished. Just stands tall and slaps it away to the right of cover point
Zia-ul-Haq to Smith, OUT, gone! Pulls his line closer to off stump and Smith looks to cut without moving his back foot. Ends up getting a thick outside edge to the keeper
Wicket: ['DR Smith c †Mohammad Rizwan b Zia-ul-Haq 11 (7b 2x4 0x6) SR: 157.14']

Commentary: Zia-ul-Haq to Haddin, no run, shortish on middle stump. Gets up on his toes to block it back to the bowler
Zia-ul-Haq to Haddin, 1 run, full outside off, Haddin doesn't get forward fully to drive, and slices it away to third man
Zia-ul-Haq to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, short on off stump, pulled away to deep backward square leg

Ehsan Adil to Sharjeel Khan, 2 runs, fullish on off stump, and that is dropped. Looks to loft it down the ground, doesn't get hold of it, and it goes high in the air over mid-off. Adnan Rasool turns around, runs towards the boundary, and looks to catch the ball dropping down from over his shoulder, and slightly overruns the ball and lets it slip through his arms
Ehsan Adil to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, length ball, pushed towards mid-off
Ehsan Adil to Haddin, 2 runs, very full, angling into off stump, jams his bat down on it and squeezes it away to the left of third man

Ehsan Adil to Haddin, no run, back of a length, angling down leg. Shuffles across to flick, and the ball slips through to the keeper, who goes up in a loud appeal. Seemed to miss the inside edge and deflect off his back pad
Ehsan Adil to Haddin, no run, back of a length, close to off stump. Goes through at a slippery pace and beats Haddin's attempted dab to third man

Ehsan Adil to Haddin, FOUR, full on off stump, and Haddin brings down a straight bat, full face showing, and punches the ball back past the bowler's feet, went too quickly for him to react and bend down to field it, and it shoots away to the straight boundary
Zia-ul-Haq to Sharjeel Khan, no run, full on middle and leg, clipped to mid-on

Zia-ul-Haq to Sharjeel Khan, OUT, not short enough to pull, and he has to drag it from outside off as well. He's a little late on the shot, and he skies it high in the air, behind the wicket, and Rizwan calls nice and early and runs to his right to pouch it safely
Zia-ul-Haq to Haddin, no run, back of a length close to off stump, dabbed to backward point
Wicket: ['Sharjeel Khan c †Mohammad Rizwan b Zia-ul-Haq 5 (7b 0x4 0x6) SR: 71.42']

Commentary: Zia-ul-Haq to Haddin, FOUR, short, rising ball over off stump. Too quick for Haddin to control his pull as he looks to take it from over his right shoulder, and gets a top edge that flies high over first slip
Zia-ul-Haq to Haddin, no run, back of a length outside off, angling away. Chases at it, away from his body, and can't connect
Zia-ul-Haq to Haddin, FOUR, fullish outside off, not quite overpitched, but the angle gave him plenty of width to bring his bat down through a smooth arc and drive crisply to the left of extra cover
Bravo to Khalid Latif, no run, slower ball outside off, gets forward for a poke to point
Bravo to Khalid Latif, no run, slower bouncer outside off. Latif shaped to pull and decided in the end to check himself and let it go through to the keeper

Bravo to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, full on off stump, driven firmly down the ground and mid-off has to move quickly to his right and slide to stop it, gets a hand to it and pushes it away into the mid-on region
Bravo to Khalid Latif, no run, slower full-toss on off stump and that's a dangerous shot. Looked to whip it across the line. Gets a fortunate inside edge into his pad
Bravo to Khalid Latif, 1 run, full on leg stump, clipped away to deep backward square leg
Bravo to Haddin, 1 run, slower ball, full on off stump, clipped to long-on
Zia-ul-Haq to Haddin, no run, full on middle stump and Haddin makes a bit of room for a flowing drive, straight to mid-off
Zia-ul-Haq to Haddin, 1 run, fullish on middle and off, Haddin plays a checked push to the right of mid-off
Zia-ul-Haq to Khalid Latif, FOUR, short down the leg side and that's easily put away. Fine leg was inside the circle, and he simply had to swat it away to his left
Zia-ul-Haq to Khalid Latif, no run, fullish on middle stump, blocked back to the bowler
Zia-ul-Haq to Khalid Latif, 1 run, slower bouncer over off stump, and Latif top-edges the pull. Pops up softly in the air, too far to the right of the keeper for him to dash across and catch
Zia-ul-Haq to Haddin, SIX, slower ball, full outside off, and Haddin spots it quickly and sets himself up, front leg inside the line, to flat-bat hard over extra cover
Mendis to Khalid Latif, 1 run, length ball on off stump, gets on the front foot to push into the point region
Mendis to Haddin, 1 run, tossed up wide of off stump. He could have left it and picked up a wide, possibly, but he reaches out and slaps to sweeper cover instead
Mendis to Khalid Latif, FOUR, shortish, down the leg side, and Latif can pick up four more easy runs by just helping it to the left of short fine leg
Mendis to Khalid Latif, 1 run, length ball on the pads, clipped towards short fine leg

Mendis to Haddin, 2 runs, tossed up wide of off stump and Haddin flat-bats it back down the ground, lots of bottom hand. Was in the air to the bowler's left, but it went too quickly for him to get his hands to it. Long-off sprawls full-length to his right to stop it
Mendis to Haddin, 1 run, full outside off, drilled down the ground to the right of long-off
Delport to Haddin, FOUR, back of a length fairly wide outside off, poor ball with third man in the circle, and he simply lets it come on and dabs it to the left of that fielder
Delport to Haddin, 1 run, full on middle and leg, clipped to deep midwicket

Delport to Khalid Latif, 1 run, length ball on middle stump, lets it come on and clips it gently into the midwicket region. They want two but Umar Akmal chases quickly from long-on to keep them down to one
Delport to Haddin, no run, full, angling down leg. Misses the flick and it hits him on the pad
Delport to Haddin, 1 run, full on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket
Delport to Khalid Latif, 1 run, slower ball outside off, gets forward for a checked push to long-off
Bravo to Khalid Latif, no run, full on off stump, clipped back towards the bowler, who bends quickly in his follow-through to stop it
Bravo to Khalid Latif, 1 run, length ball wide of off stump, flat-batted to the right of sweeper cover

Bravo to Haddin, SIX, length ball outside off, and Haddin doesn't quite get hold of the big hit. Clears his front leg to hit it down the ground, and he just cleared the leaping Umar Akmal chasing to his left from long-on
Bravo to Haddin, 1 run, full on leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket
Bravo to Khalid Latif, 1 run, shortish outside off, pulled down to long-on
Bravo to Haddin, FOUR, short slower ball wide of off stump, and Haddin adjusts to the lck of pace, sets himself up on the back foot, and cuts it away to the left of the diving backward point fielder
Azhar Ali to Khalid Latif, 1 run, shortish legbreak on off stump, waits on the back foot to whip it down to long-on
Azhar Ali to Haddin, no run, not quite short enough to cut and he bottom-edges it into the ground, bounces up and deflects off the keeper's pad into the leg side
Azhar Ali to Haddin, no run, quickish length ball outside off, leans back and dabs to short third man
Azhar Ali to Haddin, 1 run, tossed up on middle stump, driven inside-out to long-off
Azhar Ali to Khalid Latif, 1 run, length ball on middle and off, goes on the back foot to work it to deep midwicket
Azhar Ali to Haddin, 1 run, back of a length on middle stump, Haddin makes himself room to chop it away to sweeper cover
Ehsan Adil to Haddin, 1 leg bye, back of a length, angling down leg. Looks to work it away and can't put bat to ball. Rolls off the outside of his pad into the square leg region
Ehsan Adil to Khalid Latif, no run, back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on and dabs to backward point
Ehsan Adil to Khalid Latif, 1 run, slower short ball wide of off stump, slapped away to sweeper cover
Ehsan Adil to Haddin, no run, back of a length on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
Ehsan Adil to Haddin, 1 run, back of a length on leg stump, tucked away towards deep midwicket
Ehsan Adil to Khalid Latif, 1 run, length ball angling into off stump. Stays on the back foot and uses his wrists to play it down to long-on
Azhar Ali to Khalid Latif, 1 run, shortish on middle and leg, pulled away to deep square leg
Azhar Ali to Haddin, 1 run, short legbreak turning away from off stump, slapped to sweeper cover
Azhar Ali to Khalid Latif, 1 run, short again, chopped away to the left of sweeper cover
Azhar Ali to Haddin, 1 run, down the track now to drive this middle-stump ball inside-out, drives straight to extra cover, where Delport fumbles to allow the single
Azhar Ali to Khalid Latif, 1 run, nice flight on off stump, Latif doesn't quite get to the pitch with his front-foot stride, drives to the left of extra cover
Azhar Ali to Haddin, 1 run, tossed up outside off, driven to long-off, and that's Haddin's half-century
Mendis to Haddin, no run, shortens his length outside off as he sees Haddin step out. Slapped to backward point
Mendis to Haddin, no run, length ball wide of off, slapped to extra cover

Mendis to Haddin, OUT, down the track and he floats it up wide of off stump. Loads of confusion after Haddin flat-bats to extra cover. Azhar Ali fumbles, but there's such a huge mix-up between the batsmen that he can field the ball on the second attempt and throw to the keeper and still get Latif run-out. Haddin ran all the way to the other end, where Latif was unmoved till Azhar misfielded the ball. By the time he decided to run, it was too late
Mendis to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, short ball outside off and that is hammered. Just stands there and pulls it away wide of long-on. Bam.
Mendis to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, flighted outside off, stretches out to play a checked push to long-off
Mendis to Haddin, 1 run, back of a length outside off, dabbed to the left of short third man

Azhar Ali to Haddin, no run, down the track and that's a missed stumping. Sharp legbreak outside off, Haddin misses the inside-out drive, and Rizwan juggles the ball behind the stumps. Haddin drags his foot back, even though he drops his bat while doing so

Azhar Ali to Haddin, no run, and again he beats the edge. Reaches out to drive and the turn beats him. The keeper has the bails off in a flash, and Haddin's foot was momentarily in the air, but I think he's brought it down just in time
Azhar Ali to Haddin, 2 runs, back of a length on middle and off, turns away fairly sharply. Goes on the back foot to whip down the ground towards long-on
Azhar Ali to Haddin, 1 run, back of a length again, whipped from outside off stump down to long-on
Azhar Ali to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, tossed up on middle and leg and Misbah picks the length very quickly, stretches out to sweep firmly to the long leg boundary
Azhar Ali to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, a bit fuller, sweeps again and plays it to short fine leg
Zia-ul-Haq to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, not quite full enough for the cover drive as he slanted it out wide of off stump. Too early into the shot and Misbah drags it towards mid-on

Zia-ul-Haq to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, length ball on middle stump and Misbah flicks it away flamboyantly, Cooper has to sprint quickly to his left to stop it at deep square leg, he got a hand to it, but there was simply too much momentum on that shot
Zia-ul-Haq to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, short outside leg, Misbah doesn't quite middle the pull, but his placement - whether intended or not - was perfect, top-edges it to the vacant long leg boundary
Zia-ul-Haq to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, short on leg stump, and this one just sits up at waist height, easily pulled away to the long leg boundary

Zia-ul-Haq to Misbah-ul-Haq, OUT, slower ball on off stump, and Misbah inside-edges the flick into his pad. Rolls away a short distance into the leg side and he chances the quick single. Haddin doesn't respond to Misbah's call immediately, and by the time he starts moving, Zia has quickly chased the ball down and he throws down the stumps direct to find him well short at the keeper's end
Zia-ul-Haq to Asif Ali, no run, short ball wide of off stump, chopped towards backward point
Bravo to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, slower ball on off stump, clipped to long-on
Bravo to Asif Ali, 1 run, slower ball wide of off stump, sliced away towards deep point
Bravo to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, full, close to off stump, whipped to long-on

Bravo to Asif Ali, 1 run, high full-toss, was a slower ball. Asif didn't spot it till the last moment, ducked into it, and it dipped late to hit him on the glove when he was almost at full crouch, and ricocheted into the leg side
Bravo to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, slower ball outside off, dabbed gently into the cover point region
Bravo to Asif Ali, 1 run, full-toss outside off, swiped away to long-on
Ehsan Adil to Asif Ali, no run, full outside off, jabbed to extra cover

Ehsan Adil to Asif Ali, OUT, low full-toss on middle and leg, and Asif shuffles across and misses the flick. Hits low on the front pad, and that looked plumb at first glance. Hit in line with middle and leg, and would have clipped the edge of leg stump according to ball tracking
Ehsan Adil to Azhar Mahmood, no run, length ball outside off, leans across to dab to backward point
Ehsan Adil to Azhar Mahmood, no run, full on off stump, another dot ball, driven straight to short extra cover
Ehsan Adil to Azhar Mahmood, 1 run, on the pads now, clipped away to the left of deep square leg
Ehsan Adil to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, fullish on off stump, clipped to long-on
Wicket: ['Asif Ali lbw b Ehsan Adil 3 (6b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00']

Commentary: Bravo to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, full on off stump, driven back firmly, hits the stumps at the other end. Bravo reached out, didn't get his fingertips to it. Otherwise, the non-striker was well out of his crease

Bravo to Misbah-ul-Haq, 2 runs, shortish on off stump but not quite short enough to pull. Miscued it high in the air, and Zia, the man at deep square leg, is on his heels and late to come in off the rope. Maybe he was expecting someone else to be calling for that catch. The ball lands a few feet in front of him and to his right
Bravo to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, full-toss on the pads and that is a poor ball with fine leg in the circle. Misbah swivels at the hips and whips it away to the right of that fielder
Bravo to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, full on leg stump, clipped away to the left of deep square leg
Bravo to Azhar Mahmood, no run, slower ball, full and close to off stump. Azhar looks to dab it towards point and gets a thin edge that drops short of the keeper
Bravo to Azhar Mahmood, 1 run, slower ball outside off, driven to long-off
Mendis to Azhar Mahmood, FOUR, short, wide, slapped, and that races away into the gap between short third man and backward point
Mendis to Azhar Mahmood, 1 run, full on middle and leg, chipped in the air, on the bounce to long-off
Mendis to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, full and wide outside off, slog-swept to deep midwicket
Mendis to Azhar Mahmood, FOUR, floated up wide of off stump and that is flat-batted with a vengeance, not too far to the right of sweeper cover, but hit so hard he had no chance
Mendis to Azhar Mahmood, 1 run, on the pads now, worked away to the left of short fine leg
Mendis to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, sees Misbah stepping across the stumps and floats it wide of off stump. Looks for that sweep again, and the top edge runs away for four, to the left of short third man
